More information about filling out this form:

Tickets submitted by users can now be automatically routed to the appropriate group for support. By populating the below fields, product owners can list, by severity of the incident, which group has the initial ability to resolve the ticket.

Tickets can still be routed to another support group if not resolved by the initial group. For a Major Incident, please list your support team. This reduces the amount of time spent routing a major incident to your team. The TOC is still notified and aware of all major incidents (P1's).

Escalation Procedures

In the event that a major incident occurs, and the ticket is not updated within a certain timeframe, the TOC has the ability to access the escalation portion of this form to notify the appropriate resources for immediate resolution.

First Point of Contact - This is typically the system administrator for the item

Second Point of Contact - This is typically a secondary resource for the item

Product Owner - will be the product owner listed on the Product Details page
